metadata.title: Friday, 27th September, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)when construction works for the following will commence:
(i)Kaoma Police Station; (ii)offices for the Zambia Police in Nkeyema District; and (iii)Police Posts in Shimano, Mawila and Kalumwange;
(b)when renovation works at Kaoma State Prison will commence; and
(c)when works to improve sanitary conditions at the Prison will commence.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)when a new market will be constructed in Nkeyema District; and
(b)when drainages will be constructed in Kaoma Township.
(a)whether the Government has any plans to build a bridge across Mulembo River to link Muchinka and Chitambo Wards in Chitambo Parliamentary Constituency;
(b)if so, when the project will commence; and
(c)what the duration of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry what measures the Government has taken to find an investor to revive the Mwinilunga Pineapple Cannery which has been inoperational for many years.
Minister of Youth and Sport whether the Government has any plans of constructing a modern stadium in North-Western Province and, if so, where and when the project will commence.
questions.question_text: NOTICE OF MOTION AND ORDER OF THE DAY The Vice President Public Accounts Committee – Membership:  That the following Members do constitute the Public Accounts Committee for the Third Session of the Eleventh National Assembly: Mr F Mutati, MP Mr J Zimba, MP Mrs M G Imenda, MP Mr P M Mucheleka, MP Mr C Matafwali, MP Mr C Mweetwa, MP Mr A C Milambo, MP Mr V Mwale, MP Ms C Namugala, MP 1    Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address – Motion (24th September) - Resumption of Debate.
